main: ^Andres Bonifacio or Andres Bonifacio y de Castro was born in Manila on November 30, 1863, that is now celebrated as a holiday as Bonifacio Day.

c-0: ^He is the founder of KKK or Kataastaasan, Kagalanggalangang Katipunan ng mga Anak ng Bayan or also known as the Katipunan who revolted against the Spanish.
